item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Tweemoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. In this theme, you can use Twemoji kit simply writing emoji and then adding this param in the config.toml file. twemoji = false More info in the theme wiki on Github.
